nbt_ac.options.field.short_boolean.desc: Suggests 1b/0b instead of true/false for boolean value. Note that it doesn't apply to raw JSON format, as it requires true/false form.
nbt_ac.options.field.tag_quotation_marks:
Puts tag names in quotation marks.
true - Always
false - When necessary
nbt_ac.options.field.string_quotation_ma:
Puts values of string type in quotation marks.
true - Always
false - When necessary
nbt_ac.options.field.default_quotation_m:
Defines what kind of quotation mark will be used by default.
1 - Single (')
2 - Double (")
Other values will be treated as 2.
If you're using version 1.19.4 or older, note that setting it to single (especially with "Put Tags In Quotation Marks" set to "Always") may cause some issues with NBT paths due to MC-175504 bug. It also doesn't apply to JSON text components.
nbt_ac.options.field.json_string_suggest:
Defines simple string opening suggestion for JSON text components.
0 - None
1 - Recommended - same as 2 on 1.20.4 and newer, same as 3 on older.
2 - Default For Strings - uses quote type from "Default Quotation Mark Type" setting.
3 - Legacy, Separated (' ")
4 - Legacy, Merged ('") - similar to 3, but without space.
5 - Legacy, Backslash ("\")
Other values will be treated as 1.
Ignores letter case when providing tag name suggestions.
nbt_ac.options.field.show_tag_hints.desc: Shows tag hints (like its type or source) next to its name in a suggestion list.
nbt_ac.options.field.hide_forge_tags.des: Hides Forge specific tags. Requires removing "./minecraft/cache/nbt_ac" and game restart to take effect.
nbt_ac.options.field.custom_sorting.desc: Allows the mod to use non-alphabetical suggestion sorting.
nbt_ac.options.field.mark_recommended.de: Marks recommended suggestions with "<*>" in a hint.
nbt_ac.options.field.recommended_at_the_: Places recommended suggestions at the top of the list. Requires custom sorting.
nbt_ac.options.field.mark_irrelevant.des: Marks irrelevant suggestions with "<I>" in a hint.
nbt_ac.options.field.placing_of_irreleva:
Specifies the placing of irrelevant suggestions.
0 - Normal
1 - At The Bottom
2 - Hidden
Other values will be treated as 1.
Values other than "Normal" require custom sorting.
nbt_ac.options.field.hide_mc_namespace_i: Hides "minecraft:" namespace from item component suggestions.
nbt_ac.options.field.show_custom_data_as: When enabled it will always show "minecraft:custom_data" item component as relevant suggestion. When disabled it will always be shown as irrelevant.
nbt_ac.options.field.show_custom_model_d: When enabled it will always show "minecraft:custom_model_data" item component as relevant suggestion. When disabled it will always be shown as irrelevant.
nbt_ac.options.field.vanilla_ids_sorting:
Specifies the method vanilla IDs (in "minecraft:" namespace) are sorted in relation to non-vanilla IDs (from mods). It applies only to suggestions provided by NBT Autocomplete. This setting is also strongly related to "Hide Minecraft Namespace In Strings" setting.
0 - Without Custom Sorting - with hidden vanilla namespace it will cause IDs to be scattered around IDs from mods, therefore it isn't recommended.
1 - Depends - placed at the top only with namespace hidden, otherwise in the middle.
2 - Always At The Top
3 - Always In The Middle
Other values will be treated as 1.
nbt_ac.options.field.support_command_nam: Ignores the "minecraft:" as command prefix. Useful when using with plugins which put Minecraft commands under this namespace.
nbt_ac.options.field.use_new_thread.desc: Uses new thread to load suggestions during Minecraft loading.
nbt_ac.options.field.use_disassembler.de: Loads suggestions by using disassembler on "load" methods of entities and block entities.
nbt_ac.options.field.load_from_resources: Loads suggestions from resource files (required to load item tags and tag predictions).
nbt_ac.options.field.allow_block_entity_: Allows for usage of block entity extraction method (similar to one used by disassembler) after suggestions are loaded.
nbt_ac.options.field.max_cached_instance: Maximum number of cached Minecraft instances. Use -1 to disable the limit.
nbt_ac.options.field.max_stack_traces.de:
Limit of printed stack traces for exceptions.
-1 - Unlimited
 0 - Stack traces disabled
nbt_ac.options.field.debug_mode.desc: Enables additional messages and checks useful for debugging.
nbt_ac.options.field.debug_sleep.desc: Delays suggestion loading to better measure time it takes (value in milliseconds, recommended to set to a few thousand).
nbt_ac.options.field.debug_config_screen: Shows settings GUI after exiting realms screen. It isn't reset to default value by GUI reset button!
nbt_ac.options.field.save_suggestions.de:
Saves suggestions to file - ".minecraft/nbt_ac_output.txt".
0 - Disabled
1 - Enabled
2 - Enabled and sorted (easier for comparing)
Other values will be treated as 0.
nbt_ac.options.common.gui_debug_warning: Config screen debug mode is enabled!
